question: List all antiSMASH BGC categories and their descriptions.
label: Test
answer_summary_expected: There are seven BGC categories, including Polyketide (pks), Nonribosomal peptide (nrps), Ribosomally synthesized and post-translationally modified peptide (ripp), Terpene (terpene), Saccharide (saccharide), Alkaloid (alkaloid) and Other (other)
answer_sql_LLM:
SELECT functional_class_id AS category, description AS description FROM antismash.smcogs
UNION ALL
SELECT functional_class_id AS category, product AS description FROM antismash.cdss
answer_summary_LLM: I'm unable to provide a summary without access to specific data or context related to the question asked. Please provide more details so I can assist you better.
